doc:
Kevin Weisman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kevin_Weisman 0 Kevin Glen Weisman (born December 29, 1970) is an American film, television and stage actor. He has played Marshall Flinkman on the ABC television series Alias (2001–2006), Kives on the HBO television series and movie Hello Ladies (2013–14), Ray on the CBS television series Scorpion, and Dr. Maynard on the NBC television series The Blacklist. Weisman plays Ned Berring in season one of the David E. Kelley series, Goliath, as well as Dale Yorkes on the Hulu series Runaways. Kevin_Glen_Weisman ( born December_29_,_1970 ) is an_American_film_,_television_and_stage_actor . He has_played Marshall_Flinkman on the_ABC_television_series_Alias_(_2001 – 2006_) , Kives on the_HBO_television_series_and_movie_Hello_Ladies_(_2013 – 14_) , Ray on the_CBS_television_series_Scorpion , and Dr._Maynard on the_NBC_television_series The_Blacklist . Weisman plays Ned_Berring in season_one of the_David_E._Kelley_series , Goliath , as_well_as Dale_Yorkes on the_Hulu_series_Runaways .
